zoom_explanation: Initial zoom multiplier. ie: 20 = x20 zoom
zoom_time_explanation: Time (in seconds) it takes to go from initial zoom to no zoom
initial_positions_explanation: Area in which the initial zoom position can be. If set to minimum, the initial zoom will always be in the center, if set to maximum, it can be anywhere on the image (but often is on the background)
name: Name
you_are_admin: You are the ADMIN and can change the settings
only_the_admin: Only the ADMIN can change the settings
hacker_alert: Hackers are not welcome in Smash Zoom.
hacker_page: Cheating on Smash Zoom is a serious crime
